entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning late in the evening and ending after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
